snippet: The United States must distance itself from Egypt’s destructive generals, even if that means suspending all American aid.
abstract: Editorial contends Egypt's ruling generals have demonstrated beyond doubt that they have no aptitude for and little interest in guiding their country back to democracy; warns brutal repression unleashed by de facto leader Gen Abdul-Fattah el-Sisi threatens to produce a murderous civil war; calls for Pres Obama to suspend assistance to Egypt's military.
lead_paragraph: The United States must distance itself from Egypt’s destructive generals, even if that means suspending all American aid.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
